summary: Implements a React+TS marketing site with TanStack Router pages (Home/Catalog/About/Contact), a site-wide layout with responsive navigation and footer, centralized content/config in `noxContent.ts`, product catalog grid with client-side search/sort, and a contact form with client-side validation and success state. Some requested static generated images cannot be confirmed from the provided diff summary, and there are several additions not explicitly requested (backend actor stub, Internet Identity/react-query hooks, social links/business hours).

missing_requirements.requirement: Add required generated static images under `frontend/public/assets/generated` and render them in the Home and Catalog pages as default placeholders.
missing_requirements.reason: The frontend references paths like `/assets/generated/...png` in `frontend/src/content/noxContent.ts`, but the diff summary does not show the actual image files being added under `frontend/public/assets/generated` (and omitted files are not listed). Therefore the presence of the required generated images cannot be verified from the provided evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a backend Motoko actor stub (`actor {}`) even though backend work was to be added only if strictly necessary for the requested UI.
hallucinated_features.reason: UI is implemented as a static marketing site; no backend interaction is shown/required for the requested pages/forms (form submission is simulated client-side).

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced Internet Identity and actor/query hooks (authentication/agent scaffolding) not required by the marketing-site requirements.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists user accounts/auth beyond template defaults as a non-goal; the diff adds identity + actor hooks even though the site content is static.

hallucinated_features.description: Added social media outbound links in the site footer.
hallucinated_features.reason: Footer was required to contain store name and essential quick links/details, but social media icons/links were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a 'Business Hours' section on the Contact page.
hallucinated_features.reason: Contact page requirements only specified store details (owner/mobile/location/store name) and a validated contact form; business hours were not requested.
